title: A Christmas Miracle
author: msdowartyheps
text: Mr. Sarneme doesn't want any of his employees around for Christmas. What will that mean for Christine?

title: Whose Tongue Is Music Now?
author: reviews
text: "I pretended that I was as innocent as a white rosebud. I pretended that I had never woken in my bed with the sheets tangled around my legs and Erik's name on my gasping lips. I pretended that I didn't want to lean into Erik's chest and breathe in the spiced sandalwood scent of him." E/C COMPLETE

title: A Wedding Gift from the Opera Ghost
author: reviews
text: The Opera Ghost would never miss the couple's wedding day.

title: Reflected Moments
author: reviews
text: Somewhere in France, 1918. It is a year since Erik died, and Faisal remembers all that has happened. (Christine/Daroga, past Christine/Erik/Daroga)

title: At the Opera House
author: WhatisWithin
text: In mere moments, he grasped Christine by the waist and pulled her under his protective dark cloak. There, pressed against his chest he moved into the shadows of the wings, Christine blinked at the sudden darkness. "Come out ghost!" A slurred voice called out. "I know you're there, and that pretty ballet rat too."

title: The Phantom's Ghost
author: reviews
text: After several years of marriage, Erik and Christine finally move into a home above ground. However, their new house comes with a surprise built in, and the Opera Ghost finds that he must deal with a ghost of a different type. And even more supernatural dangers are lurking in the shadows...

title: The Daroga Solves a Mystery
author: Populaire7
text: Three memories where something could have happened, and two memories where something did happen.

title: all before us lie
author: LittleLongHairedOutlaw
text: In a life of ninety-four years, there are a great many things that Raoul de Chagny has forgotten. But there are a great many more that he remembers, and mostly they are people who have meant the world to him. Christine Daaé hopping in and out of his timeline is just one part. A follow-up to 'make our sun stand still', 'long love's day', and 'our time devour'

title: A Normal Life
author: Starwatcher2018
text: Post LND (based on my story Ten Long Years). Erik moves forward with his life after the shooting at the pier. As with Ten Long Years, this will likely start out as a series of one-shots which may or may not have a cohesive story line. The story opens a week after the finale of TLY.

title: I Shall Never Marry
author: degasballerina
text: Christine Daaé never left Perros, and at age twenty seven, her unmarried status makes her an object of curiosity and scorn. Raoul, Vicomte de Chagny, now a widower with a young daughter, never forgot Christine Daaé, as hard as he tried. When the two childhood friends meet again, their self-imposed pledges to remain alone forever wavers, but it's agony to try to stay apart.

title: The New Marguerite
author: lks358
text: In the wake of the 1892 fire at the Metropolitan Opera, an arrangement born of practicality and ambition may become far more than Erik or Christine expected. E/C.

title: Afflicted
author: LadyMBlakeney
text: Zombie-Apocalypse AU Bent on survival, Christine Daae has sheltered in the abandoned Paris Opera House. When circumstances send her into the cellars, she finds an unexpected ally in a world consumed by fear, suspicion, and death. Based on a Tumblr prompt by phantom-of-the-keurig

title: Once Upon a Melody
author: reviews
text: Princess Christine has been trapped in an enchanted tower for years, waiting for someone to help set her free. All hope seemed lost… until a masked sorcerer heard her sing. (a fic gift for Arelya-Andaria!)

title: All I Ask of You
author: jennyfair
text: Short phics inspired by ask games/writing prompts on Tumblr. A mix of pairings (E/C, R/C, Erik/mannequin) and genres (ALW, Leroux, LND, modern AU, Angel of Music AU).

title: The Form Beneath
author: reviews
text: Christine becomes the first to see Erik's face in several lifetimes.
